axisInfoContent: All amounts in thousands of USD
collectionsByTimeInfo: Identify collections performance trends or seasonality by reviewing collections due in the time period selected, broken down by collections received timely or late or still remaining uncollected. Click on any bar to drill into the underlying invoices.
collectionsByInvoiceAmountInfo: Analyze the impact of invoice sizes on collections by viewing aggregate collections amounts (collected late and still uncollected) broken down by invoice size and delay days. Click on any box to drill into the underlying invoices.
sankeyInfo: Identify key drivers of cash by comparing cash inflows and outflows across business categories
trendlineInfo: Identify cash flow trends or seasonality by reviewing cash inflows, outflows and net cash flows over the time period selected. Click on any bar to drill into the underlying transactions.
impactInfo:
Impact is a measure of the negative effect on cash flows due to delayed collection (uncollected and collected late) from customers
Impact for Customer A = (Collected Late + Uncollected amount from Customer A)/(Total Collected Late + Uncollected amount).
delayInfo: Delay is the weighted average of payment delays calculated using corresponding invoice amounts of all payments received post due date from a customer.
KPIsInfo: Evaluate the performance of your business through KPIs and Metrics, and identify areas impacting performance using visualizations and insights
serviceDown: Service is temporarily down. Please try after sometime.
netCashFlowTooltipInfo: Net amount of cash transferred into and out of a business in a given period
cashFlowBurnRateTooltipInfo: Total amount of operating costs incurred by the company per month
cashBufferDaysTooltipInfo: Number of days of cash outflows a business could pay out were its inflows to stop
collectionsEffectivenessTooltipInfo: Receivables collected in a given period vs total receivables available for collection
%OverdueTooltipInfo: Receivables uncollected and collected late in a given period vs total receivables available for collection
daysSalesOutstandingTooltipInfo: Measure of how long it takes customers to pay an invoice
averageDaysPastDueTooltipInfo: Average time from a invoice's due date to its paid date
turnOverRatioTooltipInfo: Measures the number of times receivables are converted to cash in a given period
delayTooltipInfo: Weighted average of payment delay days for invoices collected late
impactTooltipInfo: Measure of negative effect on cash flows due to delayed collection from customers <nl /> Impact for Customer A = (Collected Late + Uncollected amount from Customer A)/(Total Collected Late + Uncollected amount)
trendTooltipInfo: Trend may not be meaningful as time periods are of unequal duration
